title: Supervisors Election – Dev League
body:
### Summary
Idle Governance is entering the team formation phase of the Dev League.

This poll aims to elect the Supervisors that will guide devs in planning and delivery phases and provide feedback about technical solutions and approaches.

[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430) collects the applications that were submitted in the period 23th April - 30th April.

### Details
Supervisor candidates:
- @Idle Labs - [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/6)

As we only have one candidate applying for the position as supervisor we ask to agree or disagree with the profile available for this role.
 
### Other References:
- [A Step Towards Idle Leagues – Dev & Treasury](https://gov.idle.finance/t/a-step-towards-idle-leagues-dev-treasury/419)
- [About Idle Leagues](https://idlefinance.medium.com/about-idle-leagues-73fa538f18e5)

### Vote Options
A candidate is successfully elected if reached at least 10’000 IDLE votes. Please note that it's possible to change the votes at any moment till the voting window is closed.

Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
- Agree to elect Idle Labs
- Disagree to elect Idle Labs
author: 0x30723bb508E84706297EeF689C20096907023897
